body:
Is this necessary? `LogMessageFatal::~LogMessageFatal()` has `TF_ATTRIBUTE_NORETURN`, so the lack of a return statement shouldn't (AIUI) give an error. Or is this compiler-version-specific?

(Same goes for the other similar changes in here.)
